text:
Free books on Palestine, climate justice, and open tech:

• *Ecclesiastical history* — Eusebius of Caesarea, Bishop of Caesarea
  Read free: https://archive.org/details/ecclesiasticalhi01euseuoft
• *Bible* — Bible
  Read free: https://archive.org/details/holybiblesoarran01unse
• *The Innocents Abroad* — Mark Twain
  Read free: https://archive.org/details/dli.ministry.03219
• *Humanitarian Aid Work* — Carlos Martin Beristain
  Read free: https://archive.org/details/humanitarianaidw0000mart
• *Open source* — Fadi P. Deek, James A. McHugh
  Read free: https://archive.org/details/opensourcetechno0000deek

#Books #FreeCulture #Palestine #ClimateJustice #OpenAccess
